title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-2.6 - Funds of the company
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-2.6 - Funds of the company

State Regulations

Except as otherwise permitted by this Chapter, funds of
the housing company shall not be used for any purpose other than the ordinary
operation of the project, without the prior written approval of the division. Corporate funds shall not be loaned or invested without the written approval of
the division; no loans or advances shall be made at any time to officers, stockholders or employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1728-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
